metadata.description: Deposition of A. Clifford Lilly, Jr., Vice President, Technology, Philip Morris. Testimony covers Philip Morris efforts to design a non-conventional cigarette. Dr. Lilly also discusses Philip Morris research on why people smoke and the role of nicotine as well as his work on cigarette ventilation project, Beta program, and project Table.Â
